EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-11-Turbonomic Openshift Webinar Send.Turbonomic Openshift Send
EmailTemplate.subject: [Webinar] Self-Managing OpenShift with Turbonomic - Register to Watch Now!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-and-openshift-webinar/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=turbonomic_openshift_webinar]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
If you operate a large or fast-growing OpenShift Dev, Test, or Production environment, or are looking into an OpenShift investment, you’re likely already experiencing (or anticipating) the complexity of day-to-day operations.
Turbonomic provides substantial value around automating key operations – including re-scheduling, horizontal scaling, and end-to-end visibility and control of the total environment – to substantial augment the value of the native scheduler.
To learn more, please take a look at our On-Demand Webinar, Self Managing OpenShift with Turbonomic:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/turbonomic-and-openshift-webinar/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=turbonomic_openshift_webinar]]>
- Your Turbonomic Team
